Berlinlottopools Prizes

Berlinlottopools has nine different prize tiers. To win the top prize, you must match all six main numbers and the Superzahl. Your overall odds of snapping up any Lotto 6 aus 49 prize are 1 in 31. Have a look at the table below to learn more about them. An overview of the current winning numbers and winning odds for LOTTO 6aus49 on Saturday and Wednesday as well as the additional lotteries Spiel 77 and SUPER 6. You can access the lottery numbers since 1955 in the archive via the draw date.
